Detailed Description

Wizard page on which user selects tournament type.

This is a very simple wizard page containing only two radio buttons, which determines whether the tournament will be an evolutionary or round-robin tournament.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

TypePage::TypePage ( LogosWizard *  parent,
wxWizardPage *  prev = NULL,
wxWizardPage *  oneshot = NULL,
wxWizardPage *  evolutionary = NULL 
)

Constructor.

At this point in the wizard, there is a branch -- the user will continue either to a OneShotPage or to an EvoPage, depending on the radio button selected. This constructor thus accepts two 'next'-like parameters.

Parameters:
parentThe parent of this wizard page
prevThe previous page in the wizard
oneshotThe page to go to if a one-shot tournament is selected
evolutionaryThe page to go to if an evolutionary tournament is selected
